text: "King of Suede" is a song by "Weird Al" Yankovic. It is a parody of "King of Pain" by The Police. It is on Yankovic's second album, "Weird Al" Yankovic in 3-D. The lyrics are a long advertising monologue for the singer's suede clothes. Category:"Weird Al" Yankovic songs Category:Parodies Category:1984 songs
title: King of Suede
